project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Implement API call to fetch weather data
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement user input functionality to get the city name
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the features implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
